description.value:
The vigilante gains Blind-Fight as a bonus feat. He can also deal hidden strike damage against targets with total concealment.

At 10th level, he gains Improved Blind-Fight as a bonus feat and can deal all types of precision damage against targets with concealment or total concealment.

At 16th level, he gains Greater Blind-Fight as a bonus feat.

The vigilante does not have to meet the prerequisites for either Improved Blind-Fight or Greater Blind-Fight to gain these feats with this talent.
